Text: Finally, Morgan Stanley increased its stake in RR Donnelley & Sons by 242.3% in the second quarter. Morgan Stanley now owns 489,109 shares of the business services provider's stock valued at $964,000 after purchasing an additional 346,217 shares in the last quarter.
